meta_description: Discover NoBACZ's innovative and sustainable wound care products. Our rapid-setting barrier dressings prevent pathogens, promote skin repair, and are antibiotic-free. Developed by a team at the University of Cambridge.
Protect your farm animals with NoBACZ's patented skin seal technology. Antibiotic-free and made from feed grade materials, it cleanses and seals the skin to protect against environmental pathogens.

Protect your animal's navel with NoBACZ's innovative cleansing and barrier product. Our patented skin seal technology offers lasting pathogen protection without antibiotics. Suitable for bovine and equine animals.
Looking for equine product participants? Join NoBACZ Healthcare's pre-launch trial. They also offer products for bovine and navel health. Get info and contact details on their website.

NoBACZ Healthcare's patented platform technology uses food or feed additives to create strong 3D matrix gels, sprays, or liquids. These adhesive "second skin" barriers repel mud, water, bacteria, and self degrade over time. Environmentally friendly and flexible for different patient needs.
